Жопа болит

I love this game. When i was a child my parents let me play Counter Strike 1.6. I fell in love with the game. Now at my current age i decided to try Counter Strike Global Offensive. The game is really good. But there is a problem that is pretty easy to fix... HACKERS they are in a lot of my games i bought the prime matchmaking and now i have seen less hackers in my games it went from about 20 a day to now about 4.

The game is so dead compared to other games.
COD, 2019 and CW.
Valorant.
Apex.
Fortnite.
* Even league of legends past level 30.

All of these games are still active to date but it feels like this game has gone stale the mechanics suck ass, because the old rewards of being good, hitting shots has been washed unless you are absolutely pixel perfect.
This game requires too much aim, which led to a infestation of hackers since the dawn of the game being out.
Fake Angles ***Still working in TF2 btw.***
to
Desync, a new type that breaks the player model animation while the real is hidden behind walls.
People only using a cheat called backtrack, basically makes players tick go in reverse and hold a position to easily hit them.
Game is so dead in MM it takes 10 minutes to find an actual game, thank god it is dying.
Definitly the best game to ever exist, you just need to devote a huge amount of hours to playing it to become good
